translation.en: [The Man] Hello? It's happening?
It's happening! Julia, Julia, Julia!
-The baby's coming! -[Julia] But I haven't got Teddy!
translation.fr: - Le bébé arrive ! - Mais je ne trouve pas Teddy !

translation.en: [The Man] Huh? Julia, we gotta go.
Hey, I found him. Teddy's in the backseat.
translation.fr: Je l'ai trouvé, il est sur le siège arrière.

translation.en: [The Man] Let's go, honey. You're about to meet your new little sister.
translation.fr: Allons-y. Tu vas rencontrer ta petite sœur.

translation.en: [Julia] I'm not sure I want to.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas si j'ai envie.

translation.en: Oh, my goodness!
We are running terry-belly, horri-belly late!
translation.fr: On va être très très en retard !

translation.en: Are we gonna miss our big permorfance?
translation.fr: On va rater notre gros pestacle ?

translation.en: Not if we use Jaction! That's Jay plus action!
translation.fr: Pas avec Jaction ! Ça vient de "Jay" plus "action" !

translation.en: Oh... Help remind me. Why did we enter this talent show?
translation.fr: Redis-moi pourquoi on s'est inscrits à ce concours de talent ?

translation.en: Because winning could make my... [clears throat] Sorry... our career.
translation.fr: Parce que si on gagne, j'aurai... Pardon, on aura une carrière.

translation.en: Don't you want to be incredi-belly famous?
translation.fr: Ne veux-tu pas être super célèbre ?

translation.en: Let me think. No.
-Uh... Oh! Squishball! Incoming! -[all screaming]
-Psst, you're on. -Huh?
[grunts] It's okay. I got this.
[chuckles nervously] Um, hello!
Uh, here's a new one we've been working on.
Ugh! Hey, just play your old stuff, huh?
Whoa-ho-ho-ho! I give that performance my highest accolade.
translation.fr: Pour cette performance, recevez ma plus haute distinction.

translation.en: Whoo-hoo-hoo! That's high, all right.
And now we need all contestants back on stage
for the big announcement.
Drum roll, please.
And the winner of the Garden Talent Show is...
translation.fr: Les gagnants de notre Concours de chant de la Pépinière sont...

translation.en: [chuckles] the Beat Bugs
for their hilarious musical comedy act!
translation.fr: pour leur numéro de comédie musicale désopilant !

translation.en: [laughing] We won!
And here's your prize!
An entry ticket to the biggest talent show in the whole insect world,
translation.fr: Une place pour le plus grand concours de talent du monde des insectes,

translation.en: the Bug Factor!
[all gasp] The Bug Factor?
[laughs] Oh, my! We're gonna be celebri-bugs.
[chuckles] Oh, catch me. Oh!
translation.fr: Bigre. On va devenir célèbres. Retenez-moi.

translation.en: Um... what's the Bug Factor?
[announcer] And here's a sneak peek at this year's Bug Factor contestants,
translation.fr: Et voici les candidats de Bzzz Factor cette année,

translation.en: including the amazing nine-time Bug Factor winner,
translation.fr: notamment, neuf fois gagnante de Bzzz Factor,

translation.en: Queen Bee!
I can't belly-lieve we'll be sharing the stage with Queen Bee.
translation.fr: Dire qu'on va partager la scène avec Reine Miel !

translation.en: And we could win that.
Uh, but there's just one problem.
translation.fr: Il n'y a qu'un petit problème.

translation.en: The Bug Factor is held at the Rocket Ship Park over here,
translation.fr: Bzzz Factor se déroule au Parc de la Fusée, qui se trouve ici,

translation.en: and we are out in the garden,
translation.fr: et nous sommes dans le jardin,

translation.en: along the road and across the Gigant highway,
translation.fr: le long de la route, il va falloir traverser cette autoroute géante,

translation.en: through miles and miles and miles of uncharted forest,
translation.fr: puis des kilomètres de forêt vierge,

translation.en: across an even bigger Gigant highway.
Then through a jungle filled with bug-knows-what,
translation.fr: et enfin, une jungle pleine de je ne sais quoi,

translation.en: until we finally arrive
translation.fr: pour arriver à notre destination finale,

translation.en: at the Rocket Ship Park.
Which means we have a very long way to travel by tomorrow!
translation.fr: On a donc une très longue route à faire d'ici à demain !

translation.en: So, it'll be a tough trip. I get it.
translation.fr: Le voyage sera difficile. Je comprends.

translation.en: It's not a tough trip. It's totally impossible!
Freda? It can't be.
Please do not cry. Water makes me [stuttering] short circuit!
translation.fr: Ne pleure pas. L'eau me fait... court-circuiter !

translation.en: [Kumi] It's okay, Walter.
We really wanted to go to the Bug Factor, too.
translation.fr: Nous aussi, on voulait aller à Bzzz Factor.

translation.en: [stuttering] You don't understand. I have to go. I simply must.
translation.fr: Vous ne comprenez pas. Il faut que j'y aille. Je le dois.

translation.en: We know you wanna be famous, but--
translation.fr: On sait que tu veux être célèbre, mais...

translation.en: But it's too far and too dangerous.
translation.fr: C'est trop loin et trop dangereux.

translation.en: We'd have more of a chance of... uh, flying to the stars.
translation.fr: Autant nous envoler vers les étoiles.

translation.en: It can't be.
[chuckles] Isn't she from the Bug Factor?
translation.fr: C'est une candidate de Bzzz Factor ?

translation.en: -Uh, yes, Buzz, she is. -She looks exactly like you!
translation.fr: - Oui, Buzz. - Elle te ressemble drôlement !

translation.en: [laughs] Well, I don't think she's quite got my bone structure,
translation.fr: Je ne crois pas qu'elle ait la même structure osseuse,

translation.en: but yeah, yes.
[sighs] She's... my sister. My twin sister, Buzz.
-[gasps] You has a sister called Buzz? -Um, no.
translation.fr: - Tu as une sœur qui s'appelle Buzz ? - Non.

translation.en: Her name is Freda.
Oh! Why'd you never tell us about her?
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu ne nous l'as jamais dit ?

translation.en: I wanted to, but I felt so terry-belly...
translation.fr: J'ai voulu, mais je me sens terriblement coupable

translation.en: guilty about what happened.
[Walter] When we were little, Freda and I did everything together.
translation.fr: Enfants, Frida et moi étions tout le temps ensemble.

translation.en: It was like we were joined at the squish.
[Walter] Oh, my. We had so much fun together.
Until that terry-belly day.
Freda!
[stuttering] I never saw her again.
Not till today in the Bug Factor.
And now I can't get there.
translation.fr: Et maintenant, je ne peux pas y aller.

translation.en: I wonder if she even remembers me.
translation.fr: Je me demande si elle se souvient de moi.

translation.en: [Freda] Wish me luck, dear Walter.
I so need it.
[Queen Bee] Hey! You there!
-Lazy drone, get me a bigger spotlight. -Huh?
translation.fr: Le faux bourdon ! Va me chercher un plus gros projecteur !

translation.en: I'm the one fans are coming to see, not these no-talent wannabes.
translation.fr: C'est moi que les fans viennent voir, pas ces pseudo-artistes sans talent !

translation.en: Oh, uh, sorry, Queen Bee. I'm not a drone. I'm...
translation.fr: Désolée, Reine Miel. Je ne suis pas un bourdon.

translation.en: Well, I'm one of the no-talent wannabes. [chuckles]
-Yeah, Freda and the Bug-ettes? -[Bug-ettes] Hey!
Oh, yes. I heard you rehearsing. You're quite good.
translation.fr: Oui. Je vous ai entendues répéter. Pas mal.

translation.en: [gasps] Oh, my goodness!
translation.fr: Oui. Je vous ai entendues répéter. Pas mal. Oh, ma mollesse !

translation.en: Thank you so much, Queen Bee.
That means a belly lot coming from someone like--
translation.fr: C'est tellement précieux venant de quelqu'un comme...

translation.en: Quite good for a slug, I meant.
Darling, let me give you some valuable career advice.
translation.fr: Chérie, un petit conseil pour ta carrière.

translation.en: Don't even dream of getting between me and that winner's trophy.
translation.fr: Ne songe même pas à te mettre entre moi et ce trophée.

translation.en: And if you think I'm all buzz and no sting...
translation.fr: Si tu crois que je ne pique pas,

translation.en: try me.
Just gotta grab a couple things for Mom,
translation.fr: Je prends une ou deux choses pour maman,

translation.en: then we'll head back to the hospital, okay?
translation.fr: et on retourne à l'hôpital, d'accord ?

translation.en: Do I have to come, Daddy?
Oh, honey, you know, your little sister's going to be
a very special person in your life.
translation.fr: va beaucoup compter dans ta vie.

translation.en: [Julia] But she just cries all the time.
translation.fr: Mais elle pleure tout le temps.

translation.en: -And you said that-- -Tell you what.
translation.fr: - Et tu avais dit que... - Écoute.

translation.en: Afterwards, we can go to that park you love. The, uh...
translation.fr: Ensuite, on ira au parc que tu aimes tant.

translation.en: [Julia] The Rocket Ship Park! Um, okay!
translation.fr: Le Parc de la Fusée ! D'accord !

translation.en: [squeals] The Rocket Ship Park! That's where the Bug Factor is!
translation.fr: Le Parc de la Fusée ! C'est là qu'a lieu Bzzz Factor !

translation.en: I know! Oh, my belly-ness! We have to tell the others!
translation.fr: Je sais ! Nom d'une panse ! Il faut le dire aux autres !

translation.en: [Dad] Come on, Julia, we gotta get back to the hospital.
translation.fr: Allez, Julia, il faut filer à l'hôpital.

translation.en: Waltsie, I don't think we has time!
translation.fr: On n'a pas le temps, Waltsie !

translation.en: Oh, my! You're right!
-We'll have to go all by ourselves! -Oh. Oh.
translation.fr: Il faut y aller tout seuls !

translation.en: What was that?
Huh? What are they doing?
Emergency! Emergency!
[Julia] Coming.
[panting] That wasn't... so... hard.
[Jay] Walter! Buzz!
Jump down!
[gasps] Oh, my squish! What are you doing? Rescuing you!
translation.fr: - Oh, ma mollesse ! Mais que fais-tu ? - Je vous sauve !

translation.en: Slide down before it's too late!
translation.fr: Descendez avant qu'il ne soit trop tard !

translation.en: But we don't want to be rescued!
translation.fr: Mais on ne veut pas être sauvés !

translation.en: Are we sure about that?
Crick, we gotta go faster.
translation.fr: Crick, il faut aller plus vite.

translation.en: [stutters] But that could cause mechanical failure.
translation.fr: Ça pourrait causer une panne mécanique.

translation.en: Hey, look. Look over there! [grunts]
Walter and Buzz, I need you to jump down! On the count of three! One...
translation.fr: Walter et Buzz, sautez ! Je compte jusqu'à trois ! Un...

translation.en: two...
Wait, wait, wait!
Are we going on three or after three, or...
translation.fr: On y va à trois, après trois ou...

translation.en: -[siren wailing] -Malfunction! Bugs, we have to...
Jump!
This is going so well.
This car is filthy.
Walter, you okay?
I'm good!
Not so good!
-We're in-- -In deep trouble!
Uh, no. We're on our way to the Bug Factor! [laughs]
translation.fr: Non. On est en route pour Bzzz Factor !

translation.en: [Kumi] What makes you think we're going anywhere near the Bug Factor?
translation.fr: Qui te dit qu'on va en direction de Bzzz Factor ?

translation.en: -Huh? -Down here!
Um, well, we heard the Gigants and--
translation.fr: On a entendu les Géants et...

translation.en: You realize you almost got us completely squished!
translation.fr: Tu te rends compte que tu as failli nous faire écraser !

translation.en: I mean, that is so unfair!
Now, now... [laughs]
Sounds to me like somebody needs a cuddle-wuddle, hmm?
translation.fr: On dirait bien qu'on a besoin d'un petit câlin, hein ?

translation.en: Who is you?
[chuckling] So, I'm Teddy, Miss Julia's favoritest bear.
translation.fr: Teddy, l'ours préféré de Mlle Julia.

translation.en: My cuddle-wuddles are guaranteed to make you super-duper cheery again.
translation.fr: Mes câlins redonnent le sourire, garanti !

translation.en: Just ask her! I mean, just ask her.
Don't, but you could.
Thanks, but I'm not sure a cuddle-wuddle will help us get home.
translation.fr: Merci, mais un câlin ne nous aidera pas à rentrer chez nous.

translation.en: Oh, my goodness! We're not going home! We're going to Rocket Ship Park!
translation.fr: Oh, ma mollesse ! On ne rentre pas chez nous ! On va au Parc de la Fusée !

translation.en: Hey, let's turn nasty old frown upside down. [chuckles]
translation.fr: On va transformer cette vilaine grimace.

translation.en: -Bring it in, big guy. -Huh?
And not big in a judging "big."
translation.fr: Et quand je dis "gros", je ne juge pas.

translation.en: -Spirit "big." -[Walter] Hmm!
We has to go to the Bug Factor, so Walter can find Fre--
translation.fr: On doit aller à Bzzz Factor pour que Walter retrouve Fri...

translation.en: [stutters] Free... free food! [chuckles] Free food. Ooh, I love it.
That's my favorite price, and that's my favorite thing.
I hear the catering at Bug Factor is, uh, belly-licious!
translation.fr: Il paraît que le buffet de Bzzz Factor est délicieux.

translation.en: [whispering] Why don't you tell them?
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu ne leur dis pas ?

translation.en: I can't, Buzz. I feel too guilty about what happened.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas, Buzz. Je m'en veux trop de ce qui s'est passé.

translation.en: [chuckling] Still here, little bugs.
translation.fr: Je suis toujours là, les amis.

translation.en: Just good cuddle-wuddles going to waste.
translation.fr: De bons gros câlins qui se perdent.

translation.en: Come on. We gotta find a way outta here fast.
translation.fr: Venez. On doit vite filer d'ici.

translation.en: We're here, see? Rocket Ship Park!
translation.fr: On y est, voyez ? Le Parc de la Fusée !

translation.en: Uh, I wouldn't be too sure.
[The Man] Hop out for a minute, Julia, so they can clean the inside.
[Julia] Okay, Daddy.
Last chance for a cuddle-wuddle.
translation.fr: Dernière chance pour un gros câlin.

translation.en: Anyone?
Jaction time! We're out of here.
-[Buzz] What's that nasty sound? -Whatever it is, I don't like it.
translation.fr: - C'est quoi, cet horrible bruit ? - En tout cas, je n'aime pas ça.

translation.en: [man] Man, blocked again.
I hate to imagine what it's like down there, Buzz.
translation.fr: Je ne veux même pas imaginer ce qu'il y a tout en bas.

translation.en: Uh, Bugs, we're about to find out!
Bugs, we've got to stay together!
Everyone, hold...
Hold...
Hold hands!
Jaction time! Bugs, come on!
Crick, which way?
Uh, the garden should be... this way!
translation.fr: Le jardin doit être par là !

translation.en: Then the Bug Factor is this way!
translation.fr: Alors Bzzz Factor est par là !

translation.en: Walter!
The Beat Bugs always stick together!
translation.fr: Les Beat Bugs restent toujours groupés !

translation.en: Oh, my squish! Too late!
[ants] One, two! Two, two!
That's it for rehearsals, bugs.
See you back here tomorrow for the finals, and may the most amazing bug win.
translation.fr: On se retrouve ici demain pour la finale, et que le meilleur gagne.

translation.en: Oh, stop!
Oh, Freda, I was just inviting your charming band
-back to my suite for some refreshments. -[Bug-ettes cheer]
translation.fr: dans ma loge pour un rafraîchissement.

translation.en: [gasps] Oh, that's terry-belly nice of you, Queen Bee.
translation.fr: C'est très gentil à vous, Reine Miel.

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry, but I just don't have the space for a slug.
translation.fr: Désolée, mais je n'ai pas assez de place pour une limace.

translation.en: Come on, Bug-ettes. Who wants to try my finest honey?
translation.fr: Venez, les amies. Qui veut goûter mon meilleur miel ?

translation.en: [laughing] You know they say it's the sweetest.
translation.fr: Il paraît que c'est le plus doux.

translation.en: [Kumi] What is that?
We... We lost the others.
What was Walter thinking?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qu'il lui a pris, à Walter ?

translation.en: That he wants to be a world-famous bug star?
translation.fr: Il veut devenir une super star ?

translation.en: When is he not thinking that?
No, no. There's something else. Something he's not telling us.
translation.fr: Non. Il y a autre chose. Il nous cache un truc.

translation.en: Shh. There's something over there.
translation.fr: Il y a quelque chose, là-bas.

translation.en: No. No. No.
[gasps] Yes! [scoffs] No!
[groans] That was--
[splutters] Not awesome!
Jay! Kumi! Cricks!
They're proba-belly miles away.
translation.fr: Ils doivent être à des kilomètres.

translation.en: Don't be sad, Waltsie. Look! The pretty stars are coming out.
translation.fr: Ne sois pas triste, Waltsie. Regarde. Les jolies étoiles sont de sortie.

translation.en: [gasps] Oh! Oh, my squish!
They're not stars, Buzz. Run!
translation.fr: Ce ne sont pas des étoiles, Buzz. Vite !

translation.en: -Que pasa? -Come on.
Hola! I am Salvador Rat. Welcome to my studio.
translation.fr: Hola ! Je suis Salvador Rat. Bienvenue dans mon studio.

translation.en: -[all] Huh? -Your studio?
Sí! I am an artist, of course.
translation.fr: Sí ! Je suis un artiste, bien sûr.

translation.en: I call this Plástico Dramático!
And this is Metálico Fantástico!
And this... this...
is Loopy Poopy!
They're all very interesting, Mr. Salvador,
but we're looking for our friends. A slug--
translation.fr: mais nous cherchons nos amis. Une limace...

translation.en: And a bug?
Uh, sorry. No slug and bug here.
translation.fr: Désolé, ni limace ni insecte ici.

translation.en: We gotta find them.
They'll never make it home without us.
translation.fr: Ils ne pourront jamais rentrer sans nous.

translation.en: Who knows where that drain spat them out?
translation.fr: Qui sait où ce conduit les a recrachés ?

translation.en: If only there was a way we could send them a...
translation.fr: Si seulement on pouvait leur envoyer...

translation.en: a signal.
-Mr. Salvador, what do you call these? -[mumbling and chuckling]
[gasps] Ah! It's unfinished! I wait for inspiration. I am...
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas fini ! J'attends l'inspiration. Je suis...

translation.en: clogged?
You mean blocked?
Sí, sí! I have the artist blockage on this one.
translation.fr: Sí ! J'ai le blocage de l'artiste avec celui-ci.

translation.en: Well, I might have an idea.
[gasps] A collaboration? Excelente!
-I dream of working with a fellow artist. -[grunting]
translation.fr: Je rêve de collaborer avec un autre artiste.

translation.en: Trusting rats. That's what we've come to.
translation.fr: Faire confiance à un rat. Voilà où on en est.

translation.en: Oh, my squishness.
I should never have gotten you into this.
translation.fr: Je n'aurais jamais dû t'embarquer là-dedans.

translation.en: But we will get back home again. I... I promise.
translation.fr: Mais on retrouvera le chemin de la maison. Je te le promets.

translation.en: Buzz, I know you're cold and scared and--
translation.fr: Buzz, je sais que tu as froid et peur...

translation.en: -[bird screeches] -Oh, my!
But you must try to get some sleep.
translation.fr: Mais il faut essayer de dormir.

translation.en: -More wire and springs. -Hmm.
translation.fr: Plus de fil et de ressorts.

translation.en: -Hmm, wire... -[grunts]
-...and springs! -Whoa!
[Crick] Two Crick-adjustments here.
Huh. Okay, I think it's finished.
The maestro is finished! Magnifico!
Great. Let's switch it on.
Sorry, but the machine needs sunlight. To power it, I mean.
translation.fr: Désolé, mais la machine est alimentée par le soleil.

translation.en: What?
Sí. The sun go here, then here, then the power goes zap,
translation.fr: Sí. Le soleil vient là, et puis là, et l'électricité passe...

translation.en: Yeah. Like that's gonna work.
Anyway, we'd better find somewhere warm till morning.
translation.fr: En tout cas, trouvons un endroit au chaud jusqu'au matin.

translation.en: Ah. Allow me, my friends.
-Uh, what's this? -To keep you warm.
translation.fr: - C'est quoi ? - Pour vous tenir chaud.

translation.en: Aw. But won't you get cold?
I have my birthday suit.
Please. I tuck you in, sí?
translation.fr: Je vous en prie. Je vous borde ?

translation.en: Oh! Um, thanks, Salvador.
Are we ever gonna get home?
Everyone up. It's here. It's here!
translation.fr: Tout le monde debout. Il est là !

translation.en: Come on, Mr. Sun.
Bueno!
Oh, my. Buzz, look.
[gasps] Is it them?
They're hearts. It has to be them. Follow those leaves.
translation.fr: Ce sont des cœurs. C'est sûrement eux. Suis ces feuilles.

translation.en: We're out of leaves!
I'm sorry, bugs. I tried.
[both gasp] There they are!
I missed you all so much!
We missed you too, Buzz.
[Crick grunting] I... can't... breathe!
Oh, my belly-ness, I...
We should never have left you.
translation.fr: On n'aurait jamais dû vous quitter.

translation.en: Yeah, so how come you did?
I... I... I don't know what to say.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas quoi dire.

translation.en: Waltsie, you has to tell them.
-It's okay, Walter, whatever it is. -Yeah.
translation.fr: - Tu peux le dire. Quoi que ce soit. - Oui.

translation.en: Isn't that one of the singers from the Bug Factor?
translation.fr: C'est une des chanteuses de Bzzz Factor ?

translation.en: Her name is... Freda.
[stuttering] And she's my twin sister.
-[all gasp] -Your sister?
[chuckles] His sister! And she's going to be my sister, too!
translation.fr: Sa sœur ! Elle sera aussi la mienne !

translation.en: I lost her a belly long time ago.
translation.fr: Je l'ai perdue il y a bien longtemps.

translation.en: She's the whole reason I have to go to the Bug Factor.
translation.fr: C'est pour ça que je dois aller à Bzzz Factor.

translation.en: -Well, then we have no choice. -We have to go.
translation.fr: - Alors, on n'a pas le choix. - Il faut y aller.

translation.en: Awesome! Jaction time!
-[Walter] No! -What?
I've already put you in enough danger. I insist you go home. Home!
translation.fr: Je vous ai déjà mis assez en danger. Vous devez rentrer. Allez !

translation.en: Um, Walter...
even if we wanted to, we have no idea which way home is.
translation.fr: même si on le voulait, on ignore par où aller.

translation.en: [Salvador] When I am lost,
I find somewhere so high I can see the whole world.
translation.fr: je trouve un endroit si haut que je vois le monde entier.

translation.en: So, where's the highest point around here, Salvador?
translation.fr: Quel est le point le plus haut, ici, Salvador ?

translation.en: Can you see anything, Buzz?
Uh, all I see is junk.
You okay, Buzz?
[chuckles] Look! It's--
It's Mr. Kite!
If only we could fly like him, we'd easi-belly find the way home.
translation.fr: Si on pouvait voler comme lui, on trouverait le chemin de la maison.

translation.en: Or...
the way to the Bug Factor.
I'm so glad my suit came in handy.
translation.fr: Je suis content que mon habit soit utile.

translation.en: Okay, Salvador. Do your, um, thing.
[The Man] Ready to go, honey?
We gotta pick up your mom and baby sis from the hospital.
translation.fr: On va chercher ta maman et ta petite sœur.

translation.en: [Julia] Can't we stay a bit longer?
translation.fr: On peut rester encore un peu ?

translation.en: Hola! Look at me!
I am a rat. A big scary rat. Oh!
translation.fr: Je suis un rat. Un gros rat effrayant.

translation.en: Squeak! Squeak!
[The Man screams] Rat! Julia! Leave us alone!
-You monster! Go, go, go away! -He's not that scary, Daddy.
translation.fr: - Sale monstre ! Va-t'en ! - Ça ne fait pas peur.

translation.en: Now, bugs!
Good luck, little artists! Adiós! [laughs]
The Beat Bugs! What an unexpected delight!
translation.fr: Les Beat Bugs ! Quelle bonne surprise !

translation.en: Welcome aboard, my favorite passengers.
translation.fr: Bienvenue à bord, mes passagers préférés.

translation.en: We were hoping to get a kite's-eye view and see--
translation.fr: Nous espérions avoir une vue de cerf-volant pour voir...

translation.en: -Rocket Ship Park. -[gasps]
But we'll never make it there!
Not in time for the Bug Factor.
translation.fr: Pas à temps pour Bzzz Factor.

translation.en: Oh, it's impossible.
Oh, squish! That's settled, then.
translation.fr: Oh, ma mollesse ! Alors, c'est réglé.

translation.en: I just have to forget the Bug Factor, Freda, and go home.
translation.fr: Oublions Bzzz Factor et Frida, et rentrons.

translation.en: This is terrible! [screaming]
Buzz, what are you doing?
Waltsie has to find my sister.
I mean his sister, and I's not letting him give up!
translation.fr: Enfin, sa sœur, et je ne le laisserai pas abandonner !

translation.en: Buzz, you mustn't do that. It could be catastrophic!
translation.fr: Buzz, ne fais pas ça. Cela pourrait déclencher une catastrophe !

translation.en: Oopsie.
Help! Mr. Kite! How do we stop?
translation.fr: Au secours ! M. Cerf-volant ! Comment s'arrête-t-on ?

translation.en: [stutters] I'm afraid you can't!
translation.fr: Je crains que ce soit impossible !

translation.en: Not without someone pulling my string. It's all over, chaps!
translation.fr: Pas sans tirer ma ficelle. C'est fini, les amis !

translation.en: We have to pull his string!
Come on, bugs! It's our only chance!
translation.fr: Allez, les amis ! C'est notre seule chance !

translation.en: [Jay] Come on, Walter!
Come on, Walter! All together now!
All right, here I come!
Oh! Slugs are definitely not built to fly!
translation.fr: Les limaces ne sont pas faites pour voler !

translation.en: Huh. Look, Waltsie. Pocket Chip Park.
translation.fr: Waltsie, regarde. Le Parc de la Fessée.

translation.en: Let's give it up for our very own Bug Factor royalty,
translation.fr: Applaudissons bien fort la reine de Bzzz Factor,

translation.en: -Queen Bee! -[audience cheering]
And the Bug-ettes!
Hey, where you goin'? Queen Bee is singing.
translation.fr: Où vas-tu ? Reine Miel va chanter.

translation.en: Yes, with my band.
Oh, my squishness! It's the Bug Factor!
translation.fr: Oh, ma mollesse ! C'est Bzzz Factor !

translation.en: This is your captain speaking! Adopt the bug brace position!
translation.fr: Ici votre capitaine ! Mettez-vous en position de protection !

translation.en: What a thrilling turn of events.
We have an out-of-control aircraft
which appears to be heading straight for us!
Take cover!
Oopsie. [chuckles]
-I think we've squished somebody. -[grunting]
translation.fr: Je crois qu'on a écrasé quelqu'un.

translation.en: Don't touch me, you flying thugs! Security! Take them away!
translation.fr: Ne me touchez pas, bandits des airs ! Sécurité ! Emmenez-les !

translation.en: -[grunts] -No, no, no. Stop! Stop!
We were invited. We're in the competition.
translation.fr: Nous sommes invités. Nous participons au concours.

translation.en: -Sure are. -It's true.
You? Don't be absurd.
We isn't a-surd! We is the Beat Buggies!
translation.fr: On n'est pas ridicules ! On est les Beat Bugs !

translation.en: You're the Beat Bugs?
It looks like our final act just arrived.
How about that for an entrance, folks?
Ex-squish me? Do you know where Freda is?
translation.fr: Excusez-moi ? Savez-vous où se trouve Frida ?

translation.en: [chuckles] Freda? She's on her way home.
translation.fr: Frida ? Elle est rentrée chez elle.

translation.en: Poor darling couldn't handle the competition.
translation.fr: La pauvre n'a pas supporté la compétition.

translation.en: Such a pity.
[Walter] Freda, it's me!
[grunts] Oh, my. Now you're imagining you can hear him.
translation.fr: Maintenant, tu t'imagines que tu l'entends.

translation.en: It's all in your squishy head.
translation.fr: Tout ça, c'est dans ta tête toute molle.

translation.en: Please! Stop! I don't want to faint!
translation.fr: Arrête ! Tu vas me faire m'évanouir !

translation.en: Walter? Is it...
really you?
I never thought I'd see you again.
translation.fr: Je ne pensais jamais te revoir.

translation.en: Me, too, Freda.
There's so belly much I want to tell you!
translation.fr: J'ai tant de choses à te raconter !

translation.en: But right now, I have to get you back to that stage.
translation.fr: Mais là, je veux te ramener sur cette scène.

translation.en: [man] Hurry up and play something!
I mean, a song would be nice.
translation.fr: Une chanson, ce serait pas mal.

translation.en: We're gonna have a riot in a minute. You've gotta sing now.
translation.fr: Il va y avoir une émeute. Il faut chanter.

translation.en: Uh, but Walter promised he'd be--
translation.fr: Mais Walter a promis qu'il serait...

translation.en: I want to introduce you to... [sighs] Unveiling...
[sighs] Come on, Walter, get this right.
Introducing my better half!
translation.fr: Je vous présente ma belle moitié !

translation.en: No. My other half! This is...
[all] Freda!
She looks like a real-life mirror!
I want to introduce my family to...
my family.
Let's hear it for our final contestants, the Beat Bugs!
translation.fr: On applaudit nos derniers candidats, les Beat Bugs !

translation.en: You bugs might need these.
translation.fr: Vous aurez peut-être besoin de ça.

translation.en: [chuckles] I just wanna say
we've traveled so far, overcome impossi-belly odds,
translation.fr: qu'on vient de très loin, qu'on a surmonté des obstacles impossibles

translation.en: and proved that when we work together, we can do anything. [chuckles]
translation.fr: et prouvé qu'ensemble, on peut tout faire.

translation.en: Uh, Walter, what are we singing?
Just follow my lead.
[chuckling] We did it! You did it!
translation.fr: On a réussi ! Tu as réussi !

translation.en: You two are definitely related.
translation.fr: Vous êtes bien de la même famille.

translation.en: Freda, can you be my sister too?
translation.fr: Frida, tu veux bien être ma sœur à moi aussi ?

translation.en: [chuckles] I'd be honored, Buzz.
This is it, folks.
The winner of the Bug Factor is...
translation.fr: Les gagnant de Bzzz Factor sont...

translation.en: The Beat Bugs!
It's rigged! Play back the tape.
It's gotta be! It's rigged, I tell you!
translation.fr: C'est sûr ! C'est truqué, je vous le dis !

translation.en: And here's your prize. The Bug Factor trophy!
translation.fr: Et voici votre prix. Le trophée Bzzz Factor !

translation.en: [sighs] I don't deserve this.
What are you doing, Walter?
It's the least I can do to make up
translation.fr: C'est la moindre des choses pour compenser

translation.en: for letting go of you on that horri-belly day.
translation.fr: le fait de t'avoir laissée, ce terrible jour.

translation.en: What are you talking about, Walter? I was the one who let you go.
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que tu racontes, Walter ? C'est moi qui t'ai laissé.

translation.en: Um, no. I'm sure it was me, Freda.
translation.fr: Non. Je suis sûr que c'est moi, Frida.

translation.en: Oh, my belly-ness, Walter. I know it was me.
translation.fr: Oh, ma mollesse, Walter. C'est ma faute.

translation.en: -Oh... -Definitely related.
[laughs] Oh, my goodness! Then you don't blame me?
translation.fr: Oh, ma mollesse ! Alors tu ne m'en veux pas ?

translation.en: Never. I just missed you.
Gigant!
[The Man] Dad! Dad! I found my kite!
Come on, bugs! That's our ride home.
translation.fr: Allez, les amis ! On rentre chez nous.

translation.en: I am not letting you go again.
[The Man] Sorry, honey, but with all the baby gear, we can't fit the kite.
translation.fr: Désolé, avec les affaires du bébé, impossible de prendre le cerf-volant.

translation.en: [Julia] But I can't leave him behind!
translation.fr: Mais je ne peux pas le laisser !

translation.en: Wait! Wait, wait, wait! Wait. I know!
How are my passengers?
All good, Mr. Kite!
[gasps] Jay, have you got the trophy?
Huh? I thought you had it!
translation.fr: Hein ? Je croyais que tu l'avais !

translation.en: [chuckles] I can't belly-lieve you're really here!
translation.fr: Je n'en reviens pas que tu sois là !

translation.en: Neither can I, Walter.
[Julia] What's that you've got, little baby?
What a weird little thing!
[chuckles] Hey, little bug!
I think this might be yours?
translation.fr: Ce ne serait pas à vous ?

translation.en: [chuckles] Home! We're home!
translation.fr: On est rentrés à la maison !

translation.en: ♪ Love is all you need Love is all you need ♪
